com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.adapters

Class EnvironmentListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<java.lang.String>
        • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.adapters.EnvironmentListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class EnvironmentListAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<java.lang.String>
    Created by PV on 9/2/2014. A list adapter which populates items of the list shown in ManageEnvironmentFragment

      • elevations

        private java.util.Vector<java.lang.Float> elevations
        This is used while animating cards. Current elevations of all the items are stored, so that if an animation is cancelled, it can resume a new animation without jumoing to a different elevation
